description: Transliteration of Avestan 𐬵𐬀𐬊𐬨𐬀‎ (haoma). Doublet of soma.

entries.meaning: (Zoroastrianism) A plant and corresponding personified divinity, Haoma.
examples: The offering of haoma was a common practice among Achaemenids; the Haumavarga Scythians probably owe their name to the fact that they did not press the plant but strewed it ritually (HOFFMANN 1975).
